TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LazyThreadSafetyMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 实例如何同步多个线程间的访问。

span.span: Specifies how a instance synchronizes access among multiple threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此枚举指定`mode`参数构造函数。Use this enumeration to specify the `mode` parameter of constructors. 可以用此枚举描述对线程同步的所有构造函数的影响，无论它们有`mode`参数。The effects of all constructors on thread synchronization can be described in terms of this enumeration, whether or not they have `mode` parameters. A用户指定初始化方法或的默认构造函数初始化实例`T`。A instance is initialized either by a user-specified initialization method or by the default constructor for `T`. 指定初始化方法`valueFactory`参数构造函数。The initialization method is specified by the `valueFactory` parameter of a constructor. 该方法返回的实例`T`，后者是惰式实例化的实例的类型。The method returns an instance of `T`, which is the type that is lazily instantiated by the instance of . 如果一个构造函数不具有`valueFactory`参数，默认构造函数`T`用于初始化实例。If a constructor does not have a `valueFactory` parameter, the default constructor for `T` is used to initialize the instance. 在任一情况下，初始化发生第一次调用属性。In either case, initialization occurs the first time you call the property. 除了指定的线程安全性实例，此枚举会影响异常缓存。In addition to specifying the thread safety of a instance, this enumeration affects exception caching. 当为缓存异常实例，你将获得只有一次机会用于初始化实例。When exceptions are cached for a instance, you get only one chance to initialize the instance. 如果第一次，将引发异常则调用属性，缓存并对所有后续调用重新引发异常属性。If an exception is thrown the first time you call the property, that exception is cached and rethrown on all subsequent calls to the property. Caching 异常的优点是发生错误时，任何两个线程可以始终获得相同的结果。The advantage of caching exceptions is that any two threads always get the same result, even when errors occur. 当指定 PublicationOnly 模式时，永远不缓存异常。When you specify the PublicationOnly mode, exceptions are never cached. 如果指定无或 ExecutionAndPublication，缓存取决于是否指定初始化方法或允许的默认构造函数`T`用于。When you specify None or ExecutionAndPublication, caching depends on whether you specify an initialization method or allow the default constructor for `T` to be used. 指定初始化方法可启用这两种模式的异常缓存。Specifying an initialization method enables exception caching for these two modes. 初始化方法非常简单。The initialization method can be very simple. 例如，它可能会调用 `T` 的默认构造函数：C# 中的 `new Lazy(() => new Contents(), mode)` 或 Visual Basic 中的 `New Lazy(Of Contents)(Function() New Contents())`。For example, it might call the default constructor for `T`: `new Lazy(() => new Contents(), mode)` in C#, or `New Lazy(Of Contents)(Function() New Contents())` in Visual Basic. 如果你使用并不指定初始化方法，由默认构造函数引发的异常的构造函数`T`不会缓存。If you use a constructor that does not specify an initialization method, exceptions that are thrown by the default constructor for `T` are not cached. 下表总结了缓存行为的异常。The following table summarizes exception caching behavior. |模式Mode|使用初始化方法Using initialization method|使用默认构造函数 `T`Using default constructor for `T`| |----------|---------------------------------|---------------------------------------| |无None|已缓存Cached|不缓存Not cached| |PublicationOnlyPublicationOnly|不缓存Not cached|不缓存Not cached| |ExecutionAndPublicationExecutionAndPublication|已缓存Cached|不缓存Not cached|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode ExecutionAndPublication = int32(2)

summary.span: 使用锁来确保只有一个线程可以在线程安全的方式下初始化 实例。

span.span: Locks are used to ensure that only a single thread can initialize a instance in a thread-safe manner.

summary.span: 如果初始化方法（如果没有初始化方法，则为默认构造函数）在内部使用锁，则可能会发生死锁。

span.span: If the initialization method (or the default constructor, if there is no initialization method) uses locks internally, deadlocks can occur.

summary.span: 如果使用指定初始化方法（ 参数）的 构造函数，并且如果此初始化方法在你首次调用 属性时引发异常（或无法处理异常），则会缓存该异常并在随后调用 属性时再次引发该异常。

span.span: If you use a constructor that specifies an initialization method ( parameter), and if that initialization method throws an exception (or fails to handle an exception) the first time you call the property, then the exception is cached and thrown again on subsequent calls to the property.

summary.span: 如果你使用不指定初始化方法的 构造函数，则不会缓存 默认构造函数引发的异常。

span.span: If you use a constructor that does not specify an initialization method, exceptions that are thrown by the default constructor for are not cached.

summary.span: 在此情况下，对 属性进行后续调用可成功初始化 实例。

span.span: In that case, a subsequent call to the property might successfully initialize the instance.

summary.span: 如果初始化方法递归访问 实例的 属性，则引发 。

span.span: If the initialization method recursively accesses the property of the instance, an is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: 实例不是线程安全的；如果从多个线程访问该实例，则其行为不确定。

span.span: The instance is not thread safe; if the instance is accessed from multiple threads, its behavior is undefined.

summary.span: 仅应在高性能至关重要并且保证决不会从多个线程初始化 实例时才使用该模式。

span.span: Use this mode only when high performance is crucial and the instance is guaranteed never to be initialized from more than one thread.

summary.span: 如果使用指定初始化方法（ 参数）的 构造函数，并且如果此初始化方法在你首次调用 属性时引发异常（或无法处理异常），则会缓存该异常并在随后调用 属性时再次引发该异常。

span.span: If you use a constructor that specifies an initialization method ( parameter), and if that initialization method throws an exception (or fails to handle an exception) the first time you call the property, then the exception is cached and thrown again on subsequent calls to the property.

summary.span: 如果你使用不指定初始化方法的 构造函数，则不会缓存 默认构造函数引发的异常。

span.span: If you use a constructor that does not specify an initialization method, exceptions that are thrown by the default constructor for are not cached.

summary.span: 在此情况下，对 属性进行后续调用可成功初始化 实例。

span.span: In that case, a subsequent call to the property might successfully initialize the instance.

summary.span: 如果初始化方法递归访问 实例的 属性，则引发 。

span.span: If the initialization method recursively accesses the property of the instance, an is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode PublicationOnly = int32(1)

summary.span: 当多个线程尝试同时初始化一个 实例时，允许所有线程都运行初始化方法（如果没有初始化方法，则运行默认构造函数）。

span.span: When multiple threads try to initialize a instance simultaneously, all threads are allowed to run the initialization method (or the default constructor, if there is no initialization method).

summary.span: 完成初始化的第一个线程设置 实例的值。

span.span: The first thread to complete initialization sets the value of the instance.

summary.span: 该值将返回给同时运行初始化方法的其他所有线程，除非初始化方法对这些线程引发异常。

span.span: That value is returned to any other threads that were simultaneously running the initialization method, unless the initialization method throws exceptions on those threads.

summary.span: 争用线程创建的任何 实例都将被放弃。

span.span: Any instances of that were created by the competing threads are discarded.

summary.span: 如果初始化方法对任何线程引发异常，则该异常会从该线程上的 属性传播出去。

span.span: If the initialization method throws an exception on any thread, the exception is propagated out of the property on that thread.

summary.span: 不缓存该异常。

span.span: The exception is not cached.

summary.span: 属性的值仍然为 ，并且随后通过其中引发异常的线程或通过其他线程对 属性的调用会导致初始化方法再次运行。

span.span: The value of the property remains , and subsequent calls to the property, either by the thread where the exception was thrown or by other threads, cause the initialization method to run again.

summary.span: 如果初始化方法递归访问 实例的 属性，则不会引发异常。

span.span: If the initialization method recursively accesses the property of the instance, no exception is thrown.
